name: idfive
tagline: INTEGRATED MARKETING FOR BRANDS ON A MISSION.
description:
idfive is an integrated marketing firm for brands on a mission. Based in Baltimore, MD, we solve marketing and web-based problems for clients primarily in higher education, not-for-profit, and health.
Our recent clients include: Johns Hopkins University, the University of Baltimore, Howard University, the Maryland Food Bank, SUNY Potsdam, and University of Hartford.
